home.name: Anubhaw Chandel
home.description: I Edited 110+ Video In Last 4 Years using Capcut, Alightmotion, Premiere Pro.

about.title: I'm Anubhaw Chandel and
about.description: As a Video Editor, I'm specialized in creating visually appealing edits and motion graphics that not only captivate viewers but also provide them value. I continuously seek inspiration from current video trends and am committed to honing my skills through ongoing learning and experimentation. My ultimate goal is to craft visual experiences that engage users and drive results for my clients.

education.title: Master in Computer Science
education.text: I learnt a wide range of topics that are essential to understanding both the theory and practical aspects of computing. This involves programming fundamentals, computer architecture, operating systems, databases, software engineering, problem solving, collaboration and communication soft skills.

education.title: Master Degree
education.text: I chose my master degree in technology. There I deepened my knowledge, enhanced my skills in the area and learnt how to increase my career prospects in a competitive job market.

education.title: Bachelor Degree
education.text: There I learnt foundational courses and computer sciences fundamentals. In the institution, I chose my specialization in web-development that involves front-end and back-end technologies, user interface designs and content management systems.

experience.title: Senior Front-end Designer
experience.text: I can design complex software systems. My decisions impact scalability, maintainability, and overall system architecture. Also, I mentor less experienced team members, helping them grow and learn.

experience.title: Junior Front-end Designer
experience.text: I learnt to code in an existing codebase, dive into the project and understanding its structure. Also I worked closely with senior software engineers that guided me, answered my questions and helped me grow.

experience.title: Graphic Designer
experience.text: I can create logos, color schemes and typography for a brand's identity. Also I develop graphics for websites, social media and digital ads with applications that enhance user experience.

services.title: Video Editor
services.description: I offer custom website designs, responsive design to ensure compatibility across devices, and UI/UX design to enhance user experience.

services.title: Graphic Design
services.description: I design logos, icons, illustrations, and other visual assets that enhance the website's branding and aesthetic appeal.

services.title: Digital Marketing
services.description: I build websites that enhances visual aesthetics, user experience, SEO, responsive design and mainly conversion optimization.

services.title: UI/UX Solutions
services.description: I offer custom research and design to increase your customer satisfaction and obtain higher conversion rates.

services.title: Brand Consultancy
services.description: I build brands through cultural insights & strategic vision. Custom crafted business solution.

services.title: Photography
services.description: I make high-quality photos of any category at a professional level.
